procedure.name: AddLink
procedure.statement: INSERT INTO linktable (id1, id2, link_type, visibility, data, time, version) VALUES (?,?,?,?,HEXDATA,?,?) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET visibility = excluded.visibility
INSERT INTO counttable (id, link_type, count, time, version) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, 0) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET count = excluded.count + ? , version = excluded.version + 1 , time = ?
UPDATE linktable SET visibility = ? , data = HEXDATA , time = ? , version = ? WHERE id1 = ? AND id2 = ? AND link_type = ?
